snippet: SAKOWITZ--Karen, on April 26, 2016. Beloved wife of Julius. Devoted mother of David. Loving sister of Robert. She will be deeply missed by her family and friends. Funeral services Sunday, 9:30am at Frank E Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. (81st St.) 1/3
lead_paragraph: SAKOWITZ--Karen, on April 26, 2016. Beloved wife of Julius. Devoted mother of David. Loving sister of Robert. She will be deeply missed by her family and friends. Funeral services Sunday, 9:30am at Frank E Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. (81st St.) 1/3
